bdfb30ef-0da7-46e3-89a9-b0e1ada838b6.description:
Receives the path of the source file to copy.

Example:
"/home/user1/dir1/foo.txt"

(To keep the application portable use "/" as path separator.)
bdfb30ef-0da7-46e3-89a9-b0e1ada838b6.name: source

f2de4810-6a6f-4191-a5c8-488099f67b04.description:
Receives the path of the desired target file.

Example:
"/home/user1/dir2/bar.txt"

(To keep the application portable use "/" as path separator.)
f2de4810-6a6f-4191-a5c8-488099f67b04.name: destination

2bfd6834-e8b7-4d12-95a4-588e2c9dbe31.name: bounced

b51bebcf-125e-46c7-a537-3d82c9be4fae.name: copied

2e29c5f3-28f9-4351-87e5-7c9bf80721fd.name: error

name: io/file/File copier
